comment: Through mailing lists etc., individuals and those engaged in specific sections of Android projects can both communicate with each other as well as those with more access to higher level decision making.

Individual developers (as themselves, or representing a corporation) can join one of five different mailing lists, or talk with people on IRC. Since the project is maintained by developers, widespread dissent would definitely effect the direction of the project. However, one could argue that the feedback is not effective since Google has a privelged position in goal setting.
